name: The Uncomfortable Fun of Escapism
description:
That thing when you feeling guilty pleasure by enjoy your favorite meals but afraid to not gaining weight and to become ills, every joyness or happiness i achieve is just another simple ways for me to faces death. In the time of celebrating Halloween, to sums it up. So, eating is like one of the most truest horror for me. And also there are visuals for all the coping mechanisms that i do or consume to keep me sane.
Happy Halloween.
The original physical painting have been on two exhibitions, first time at Lunch Time! art exhibiton at Kanaal Artspace in Jakarta, Indonesia. And secondly at Festival Kesenian Yogyakarta XXVI Cut & Re-mix art exhibition at Jogja Gallery in Jogjakarta, Indonesia.
